name: Single-Leg Stability Drills
description: Improving unilateral balance and coordination for injury prevention.

cards.title: Single-Leg Deadlifts for Balance & Strength
cards.description: Enhancing posterior chain strength and balance with single-leg deadlifts.
bulletpoints: Maintain a neutral spine while hinging at the hips
Engage glutes and hamstrings for stability
Use light weights to improve control and coordination
cards.summaryText: Hinge on one leg with a flat back, driving hips back to fire hamstrings while keeping balance tight.

cards.title: Y-Balance Test & Progression
cards.description: Assessing and improving dynamic balance and stability.
bulletpoints: Use tape markers to measure reach distances in different directions
Improve lower body stability by strengthening weak movement patterns
Repeat tests periodically to track progress in balance
cards.summaryText: Reach along the Y pattern to spot asymmetries, then train weak lines and retest for better balance.
